text: waldhyn yusaddiqwn bima 'unzl 'iilayk 'ayuha alrasul min alqran, wabima 'unzil 'iilayk min alhkmt, wahi alsnt, wbkl ma 'unzl min qablik ealaa alrusul min ktb, kaltwrat wal'iinjil wghyrhma, wyusaddiqwn bdar alhayat baed almawt wama fiha min alhisab waljza', tsdyqa bqlwbhm yuzhir ealaa 'alsinatahum wjwarhhm wakhasa yawm alakhrt; li'ana al'iiman bih min 'aezam albwaeth ealaa fiel altaeat, wajtnab almhrmat, wmhasbt alnfs
